name: John and the Hole
description: A coming-of-age psychological thriller that plays out the unsettling reality of a kid who holds his family captive in a hole in the ground.

review.author: brendastar-55888
review.heading: Sociopath
review.reviewBody: He seemed to me to be missing a few screws, he had a nice family and house, no abuse from anyone, but decided he wanted to be alone and be grown. But how he did this was way over the top with his family and when it was over, everyone acted as if nothing happened. Police and crazy house for him. After I jacked him up.
